titles.title: Recognizing the importance of intersectionality for abortion access.
Recognizing the importance of intersectionality for abortion access.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: This resolution recognizes that women of lower socioeconomic standing face the greatest risk when abortion is restricted and acknowledges that women of racial and ethnic minorities, particularly Black women, are at highest risk when abortion is restricted.
